commit.message:
re PR c++/63905 (redundant fields left in gcc/cp/cp-tree.h:lang_decl_fn)

2014-11-24  Paolo Carlini  <paolo.carlini@oracle.com>

	PR c++/63905
	* cp-tree.h (lang_decl_fn): Remove constructor_attr, destructor_attr.

From-SVN: r218001
